page.title: 01OUR DOMESDAY BLOCK: SHAWHEAD
page.content:
Our block of 12km square is all farmland. On the farms are mostly beef, dairy and sheep. In summer the farmers have to do silage, hay and straw. Some grow vegetables.
In our square we have the village of Shawhead. In the village is a Primary School, the one I am at just now. We have a Post Office which sells petrol and is also a shop. There is a Hall that is used for all sorts of sport. Next door to the Village Hall is a Mission Hall where Church Services are sometimes held. We have a telephone box and a bus stop.
The A75 runs through our square. It is very busy because it is the Euro- route to Stranraer. All the lorries go past on their way to Stranraer.
